title: Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt in the library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select any item for the first time in the library outline view, it fails to get selected.

Observed Behavior: The selected item does not get highlighted or marked as selected in the library outline view.

Expected Behavior: The item should be selected and visually indicated as such in the library outline view.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Try selecting the label item in the library outline view.
